hadiths.text: Nu'man b. Bashir reported that his father brought him to Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) and said:I have donated this slave of mine to my son. Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said: Have you donated to every one of your sons (a slave) like this? He said: No. Thereupon Allah's Messenger (may peace he upon him) said: Then take him back

chapter.ara-name: باب كَرَاهَةِ تَفْضِيلِ بَعْضِ الأَوْلاَدِ فِي الْهِبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: It Is Disliked To Favor Some Of One's Children Over Others In Gift-Giving
